sourcesContent:
Drop files here or click to upload.
(This is just a demo dropzone. Selected files are not actually uploaded.)
{{ f.name }} ({{ f.type }})
AddCancel
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NgbDateStruct } from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-project', templateUrl: './create-project.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-project.component.scss'] }) export class CreateProjectComponent implements OnInit { files: File[] = []; startingDate: NgbDateStruct; endingDate: NgbDateStruct; onSelect(event) { this.files.push(...event.addedFiles); } onRemove(event) { this.files.splice(this.files.indexOf(event), 1); } constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } }
